切り込む: (きりこむ) - to cut into/to cut up; to raid/to attack
切り返し: (きりかえし) - railway switchback; {sumo} twisting backward knee trip
切り返す: (きりかえす) - to slash back; to strike back/to counterattack/to retort; to cut the wheel; {sumo}  to perform a twisting backward knee trip
切り通し: (きりとおし) - (railway) cutting; excavation; sunken road; opencut
切り通す: (きりとおす) - to cut through (with a road, tunnel, or canal)
切り進む: (きりすすむ) - to cleave; to saw through; to hack apart
切り金: (きりかね) - metallic foil cut into strips or other shapes to form decorative motifs; cutting a thin sheet of metal into shapes and affixing it with lacquer forming natural features (e.g. clouds)
切り開く: (きりひらく) - to clear (land); to open up; to cut through
切り除ける: (きりのける) - to cut off; to cut out
切り離す: (きりはなす) - to detach; to decapitate; to cut loose; to let loose; to dismember
切り離れる: (きりはなれる) - to cut off and separate
切り餅: (きりもち) - rice cakes cut into rectangles (esp. eaten on New Year's Day)
切る: (きる) - to cut/to cut through/to perform (surgery); to sever (connections, ties); to turn off (i.e. the light); to terminate (i.e. a conversation)/to hang up (the phone)/to disconnect; to punch (a ticket)/to tear off (a stub); to open (something sealed); to start; to set (a limit)/to do (something) in less or within a certain time/to issue (stamps, vouchers, etc.); to reduce/to decrease/to discount; to shake off (water, etc.)/to let drip-dry/to let drain; to cross/to traverse; to criticize sharply; to act decisively/to do (something noticeable)/to go first/to make (certain facial expressions, in kabuki); to turn (a vehicle); to curl (a ball)/to bend/to cut; to shuffle (cards); to dismiss/to sack/to let go/to expulse/to excommunicate; to dig (a groove)/to cut (a stencil, on a mimeograph); to trump; (in Go) to isolate (an opponent's stone); (also written as 鑽る) to start a fire (with wood-wood friction or by striking a metal against stone); to draw (a shape) in the air (with a sword, etc.); (after the -masu stem of a verb)  to finish/to complete
切れ: (kire) - pedaço, fatia, tira, fragmento; tecido; afiado; agilidade
切れが悪い: (きれがわるい) - thick; dull (blunt); viscous
切れっ処: (キレット) - gap (in a mountain ridge)
切れっ戸: (キレット) - gap (in a mountain ridge)
切れっ端: (きれっぱし) - scraps; cut end; cut-off piece
切れない: (きれない) - being too many or too much (to finish or complete)
切れる: (きれる) - to break/to snap/to be cut/to split/to crack; to be injured; to wear out/to be worn out; to break/to burst/to collapse; to wear off/to stop working/to go dead; to expire (time limit, etc.)/to run out/to become due; to run out (of stock, etc.)/to be exhausted/to be used up/to be sold out/to be out of; to be broken off (e.g. of a relationship)/to break up/to have severed ties/to be cut off/to be disconnected; to cut well/to be sharp; to be sharp-minded/to be keen/to be shrewd/to be quick-witted/to be able; to be short of/to drop under (a certain figure)/to beat (e.g. a record time); to dry off; to curve/to veer; to shuffle (cards); to get angry/to snap/to blow one's top/to lose one's temper/to flip; to be able to do completely
切れ上がる: (きれあがる) - to turn up (at the edge); to leave a clean aftertaste
切れ上る: (きれあがる) - to turn up (at the edge); to leave a clean aftertaste
切れ口: (きれくち) - cut end; section; opening; slit
切れ味: (きれあじ) - sharpness/cutting ability; quickness (of wit)/incisiveness/technical proficiency/skill; (in ball sports) peppiness (of a ball)
切れ字: (きれじ) - punctuation words in haiku, renga, etc. such as "ya", "kana", "keri", etc.
切れ無い: (きれない) - being too many or too much (to finish or complete)
切れ物: (きれもの) - edged tool; cutlery; shrewd businessman
切れ目: (きれめ) - break; pause; gap; end; rift; interruption; cut; section; notch; incision; end (of a task)
切れ端: (きれはし) - scraps; cut end; cut-off piece
切れ者: (きれもの) - sharp and able person
切れ長: (きれなが) - long slits (esp. the eyes)
切れ長の目: (きれながのめ) - almond eyes; slit eyes
切タイマー: (きりタイマー) - off timer (i.e. to automatically turn an electrical device off at a certain time)
切上げ: (きりあげ) - end/conclusion; rounding up; revaluation
切上げる: (きりあげる) - to close/to finish; to round up (a number); to revalue (a currency)
切上げ機能: (きりあげきのう) - round-up function; rounding
切付ける: (きりつける) - to cut at; to slash at
切倒す: (きりたおす) - to cut down; to chop down; to fell
切先: (きっさき) - point (of a sword, etc.); pointed verbal attack
切処: (キレット) - gap (in a mountain ridge)
切出す: (きりだす) - (切り出す, 切出す, 伐り出す only) to quarry/to cut (timber)/to cut and carry off; (切り出す, 切出す only) to begin to talk/to break the ice/to broach; (切り出す, 切出す, 鑽り出す only) to start a fire (with flint, by rubbing sticks together, etc.); (切り出す, 切出す, 伐り出す only) to select and extract (from a media file)/to splice out
切刃: (せっぱ) - thin washer on either side of the guard (tsuba) of a sword; (up to) the hilt/wits' end
切削: (せっさく) - cutting; a cut; machining
切創: (せっそう) - cut wound; incised wound; knife wound
切取り: (きりとり) - cutting/tearing off/cutting off/clipping; robbery with assault/burglary
切取り画素配列: (きりとりがそはいれつ) - clipped pel array
切取る: (きりとる) - to cut off; to excise; to tear off; to cut out; to whittle down; to tear out; to cut down; to amputate
切口: (きりくち) - cut end/section/opening/slit; point of view/(different) perspective/new approach
切合い: (きりあい) - crossing swords; fighting with swords; cutting each other (in fighting)
切味: (きれあじ) - sharpness/cutting ability; quickness (of wit)/incisiveness/technical proficiency/skill; (in ball sports) peppiness (of a ball)
切回す: (きりまわす) - to manage/to control/to run/to handle; (also written as 斬り回す) to cut carelessly (of a cook, surgeon, etc.)/to slash about; to cut around
切妻: (きりずま) - gable; gabled roof/building with a gabled roof/gabled roof construction
切妻造: (きりづまづくり) - gabled roof; building with a gabled roof; gabled roof construction
切妻造り: (きりづまづくり) - gabled roof; building with a gabled roof; gabled roof construction
切子ガラス: (きりこガラス) - cut glass; faceted glass
切字: (きれじ) - punctuation words in haiku, renga, etc. such as "ya", "kana", "keri", etc.
切実: (せつじつ) - compelling; serious; severe; acute; earnest; sincere; pressing; urgent; keen; fervent; poignant
切実に: (せつじつに) - strongly; keenly; vividly; sincerely; urgently
切尖: (きっさき) - point (of a sword, etc.); pointed verbal attack
切山椒: (きりざんしょう) - sweetened mochi flavoured with Japanese pepper
切幣: (きりぬさ) - thinly cut hemp or paper mixed with rice (scattered as an offering to the gods)
切干し大根: (きりぼしだいこん) - thinly sliced and dried strips of daikon
切干大根: (きりぼしだいこん) - thinly sliced and dried strips of daikon
切張り: (きりばり) - patching (up)/cutting a part and pasting a new one (e.g. a shoji door); cut and paste
切戸: (キレット) - gap (in a mountain ridge)
切戸口: (きりどぐち) - small wooden door at the rear of a noh stage; small garden gate
切戻: (せつらい) - switch-back (reversal of redundancy switching following repair)
